snippet: The N.F.L.’s response against Ray Rice shows that protecting another lucrative season is all it cares about.
abstract: Editorial contends investigation into NFL's handling of Ray Rice domestic abuse case, to be led by former FBI director Robert Mueller III, needs to be thorough and convincing if league cares about its credibility; urges team owners to make it clear that there will be no more outrageous leniency for players whose violence spills over into the home.
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s response against Ray Rice shows that protecting another lucrative season is all it cares about.

headline.seo: The N.F.L.’s Disgraceful Response to the Ray Rice Case
